title: Can Labour Unite? (with Jonathan Reynolds MP)
itunes:title: Can Labour Unite? (with Jonathan Reynolds MP)
description:
Jonathan Reynolds, Labour MP and Shadow Work and Pensions Secretary, says the party need to be ambitious for the future. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that Labour's plans have to be credible.

Bloomberg Opinion Editor Therese Raphael discusses the petrol crisis and rows and resignations as Keir Starmer addresses the party conference in Brighton.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
